segments.text: I see the boy reaching for the cookie jar, and I’m holding my breath.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it’s about to tip, and he’s going to fall right into that puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, completely trusting him not to mess this up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is drying dishes, completely unaware of the disaster happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe she hasn’t noticed the water overflowing all over the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s like she’s in a trance, just focused on that one plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are getting away with stealing cookies, and it’s kind of impressive.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long they’ve been doing this before she finally notices.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is spreading, and the floor is going to be a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone steps in before something bad happens.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is one of those moments where you just have to laugh at the absurdity.
segments.speaker: PAR
